```{r library}
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
library(cowplot)
ubdc_palette <- c("#13AFD6", "#E6E600", "#F07329", "#35B14E", "#D7509A", "#2165AF",
                  "#BCD032","#866BAC", "#545A5D",  "#7A8082", "#E2D988", "#628DB7",
                  "#929B9A", "#93B8DA", "#31649B", "#FBF8D0", "#ACB2B4")
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = 'C:/GitHub/thesis_rmd/data/play_figures')
```

```{r}
play_1 <- diamonds %>% ggplot(aes(cut, carat, fill = cut)) + geom_col() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = ubdc_palette) + theme(legend.position = "none")
play_1
```

```{r play_2}
play_2 <- diamonds %>% ggplot(aes(clarity, carat, fill = cut)) + geom_col() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = ubdc_palette) + theme(legend.position = "none")
play_2
```


```{r play_cowplot}
play_fig_1 <- plot_grid(play_1, play_2, ncol = 2)
play_fig_1
```

```{r save}
save_plot("play_fig_1.png", play_fig_1)
```
